gui.components
Class Messenger

java.lang.Object
  gui.components.Messenger

public class Messenger
extends java.lang.Object

Static-type class for displaying simple messages (Custom JOptionPane message dialogs).

Constructor Summary
Messenger()
           
 
Method Summary
static void display(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String title)
          Displays a message dialog with a title centered on the screen for the user to read; closes with an OK button.

Method Detail

showMessage

private static void showMessage(java.lang.String message,
                                java.lang.String title,
                                java.awt.Component parent,
                                int messageType)
Displays a message dialog with a title centered in the parent for the user to read; will be a JOptionPane type of message; closes with an OK button.

Parameters:
message - message to display
title - title for the message dialog
parent - GUI component where this message dialog will be centered; if null, centered on the screen
messageType - the JOptionPane type of message this is
